name: torrent-bot
description: Torrent bot for downloading and searching torrents

scripts.build-web: cd web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-main: rm -rf dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel . --out-dir dist --ignore node_modules,web,config.dev.js,proxy.js && mkdir -p dist/web && cp -r web/build dist/web/build && touch dist/logs.txt
scripts.deploy: npm run build-main && rm -rf ../dist-app/dist && cp package.json .gitignore app.json .babelrc ../dist-app && cp -r dist ../dist-app && rm -rf dist
scripts.push: cd ../dist-app && git add . && git commit -m 'changes' && git push origin master && git push heroku1 master && git push mdiskdoodbot master
